__e: I came to check on him,and... Well,I have no idea where he went.
I know you said I should control it, and I've tried, Gran, I have.
I know that, and I know that you can't control it and that... and that you have a good heart.
He always had the upper hand, he always had control over me and I wanted control, i wanted to win just once!
I get it. You want me to swing by, make sure he has fresh water, you know...
Yeah, he -- he can jump into another person's body and control them for a while, but then, whoosh, he ends up back in his old body.
